allow:
Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ".specify/scripts/powershell/create-new-feature.ps1" -Json "Todo Full-Stack Web Application \(Phase-2 Hackathon\)

Target audience:
Hackathon evaluators and developers reviewing spec-driven full-stack systems

Focus:
Transform an in-memory console todo app into a secure, multi-user, full-stack web application using spec-driven development

Success criteria:
- Implements all 5 basic todo features as a web application \(add, list, update, delete, complete\)
- Exposes fully functional RESTful API endpoints
- Persists data using Neon Serverless PostgreSQL
- Enforces JWT-based authentication using Better Auth
- Ensures strict user data isolation across all API operations
- Frontend successfully consumes secured backend APIs
- Application runs end-to-end without breaking specs or security rules

Constraints:
- Frontend: Next.js 16+ using App Router
- Backend: Python FastAPI
- ORM: SQLModel
- Database: Neon Serverless PostgreSQL
- Authentication: Better Auth with JWT tokens
- API format: REST, JSON-based
- Secrets: Managed via environment variables only
- Architecture: Frontend and backend must remain separate services
- Timeline: Hackathon Phase-2 scope

Not building:
- Mobile application
- Real-time features \(websockets, live sync\)
- Role-based access control beyond single user ownership
- Advanced UI animations or design systems
- Third-party integrations beyond Better Auth and Neon
- Deployment automation or CI/CD pipelines" -Json -Number 1 -ShortName "todo-fullstack-app")
